page.title: 13Appendix l- Farms,Park Cross
page.content:
Park Cross farms and their activities_
Bowcombe Barn _____ Beef,Sheep,Cereal. Plaish ____________ Dairy,Beef,Cereal. White Lane ________ Dairy,Beef,Cereal. Alvington Manor ___ Dairy,Beef,Cereal. Read's ____________ Dairy. New Park __________ Dairy,Cereal. Great Park ________ Arable (wheat,barley,oilseed rape) Park Place ________ Beef,Cereal. Apesdown __________ Beef,Cereal. Ashengrove ________ Dairy,Beef,Cereal. Durrants __________ Beef,Sheep. Vittlefields ______ Dairy,Beef. (agricultural contractor) Poleclose _________ Dairy. Westwood __________ Dairy. (agricultural contractor). Park Green ________ Beef. (slaughterhouse).
